summary: The plot centers on a young female doctor Carmen with a terminal disease. A feeling of urgency unconsciously leads her to live each moment of her life as it were the last. During this ... See full summary »
cast: Leandra Leal|Cauã Reymond|Lee Taylor|Nazareno Casero|Dira Paes|Debora Duboc|Sidney Santiago|Marat Descartes|Érica Ribeiro|Luisa Micheletti|Luciano Chirolli|Zécarlos Machado|Natallia Rodrigues|Júlio Calasso|Ivanete de Araújo|Manuel Pedro Dos Santos|Cláudia Juliana|Douglas Simon|Yaniel Mattos|Luísa Maita|Edgard Scandurra|Eduardo Bid|Pedro Bandeira
title: Estamos Juntos
